module.name: mailinblue
module.description: Synchronize your PrestaShop contacts with MailinBlue platform, track customer's orders and send transactional e mails easily to your customers.
module.author: MailinBlue
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to remove the MailinBlue module? N.B: we will enable php mail() send function (If you were using SMTP info before using MailinBlue SMTP, please update your configuration for the emails)
